website_summaries.verdict: A great budget-option for a modern dual flush toilet with an affordable price tag.
pros: Low, narrow profile makes the toilet stand out in modern and contemporary bathroom styles
Full flush setting has plenty of power to prevent most potential clogs
cons: The toilet is sometimes delivered with cracks or other damage, requiring a replacement

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet and price, install tip
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these earlier in the year and I'm ordering another one now! Dual flush is nice on a septic system. Toilet comes with everything needed and the install was simple. Installation pointer. The instructions are terrible. I couldn't figure out to remove the toilet seat. Put the seat up and push buttons on both sides of the hinge to release seat from the mount. Picture is attached.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas M. Martin

customer_reviews.title: CONSTANTLY LEAKS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item in July 2019 but it was not installed until September 2019 during my major bathroom remodel. There is a problem with the valve controlling the reservoir refill. The plumber who installed the toilet has been back here twice to try & adjust it but says it appears the valve is defective. Some days it works fine but most days it continually empties & refills of it's own accord. We are now at the point where we constantly have to shut off the water main to avoid a ridiculously high water bill from the wastage.
customer_reviews.author: shadow

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet for small bath!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first toilet we have installed and it couldn't have gone smoother! The instructions were clear and it took only 1 hour to get the water hooked up and the toilet seated. I was concerned that there wouldn't be enough water on the flush to make everything go down but we have had no problems with that at all! This toilet is very sleek and modern looking. Overall this is a strong recommend if you don't want a clunky toilet in your small bath or even in a large bath!
customer_reviews.author: ann m schuett

customer_reviews.title: You take your chances on shipping.
customer_reviews.text: The toilet was cracked and chipped in two places. What a headache. I had to fight with UPS to get them to return it. Toilet is certainly not protected on left side -should have had styrofoam insert. I paid for a plumber and he charged even though the toilet was bad. Well, it wasn't his fault so I cant blame him. Will now have to find another toilet. This toilet would have been nice so I am VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Electronics Nut

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome style and great price . Works great and looks fantastic highly recommend this toilet
customer_reviews.author: vincent talamantez

customer_reviews.title: Exquisite Elegant Design with Speedy Delivery!
customer_reviews.text: The Swiss Madison Chateau Toilet is an exquisite design. Its simply Gorgeous spectacular contemporary styling! The photo does not capture its curves or do it justice! The Chateau looks very high quality and expensive, like a million bucks. We are tickled, We just Love it! The product came packaged perfectly almost impossible for any damage to ever occur. With a Speedy delivery. Its quite hard to beat!
customer_reviews.author: Larry M

customer_reviews.title: It works well and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the appearance and the flushing action. Installation was quite easy although I recommend you get a couple extra nuts or retaining washers to hold the closet bolts in place when you are lowering the toilet onto the flange. Overall great value. Another plus when I discover two small missing bumpers for the seat were missing the customer service sent them out FedEx quickly. Kudos for customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Simons

customer_reviews.title: Ladies Toilet was not designed to process tall man deposits
customer_reviews.text: I must admit that I am disappointed that no one else mentioned it, but the THROAT of this toilet is considerably smaller than the American standard and consistently chokes on whatever it attempts to swallow. Besides that, this petite commode looks fantastic and appears to be very well made. However, if we didn't have to use a stick and a force cup plunger to stir up the contents after every deposit I would have easily given it an overall five star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Semi skirt 12 inch rough
customer_reviews.text: This one was installed in the main bathroom/guest after we did some renovations.. Love the product. Our plumber was very happy with the installation ,it fitted perfectly I had to returned the other one because it didn't fit on the master bedroom. We need a 10 inch rough. I don't think Swiss Madison has the same toilet with the 10" rough.Still looking.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen M Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great product (replace seat it sucks)
customer_reviews.text: Great product, low water usage, and no problems. Should up and had it installed in no time. Had to replace the seat but product is solid. (Seat sucks)
customer_reviews.author: MikeHollandNC

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work!!!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work! I needed to buy another toilet from Lowe’s because it doesn’t work when the guys come to my house to do their work. Now I cannot returned because the days passed ... don’t waste your money and make sure if you can try it and then you can return it! Now.. I spent miren than 200$ buying this thing now it doesn’t work and my money went to the garbage!
customer_reviews.author: fernando Marin

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: We needed to replace our toilet and needed a short toilet 24" or less this one was advertised at 23" tall when it came it was 251/2" and couldn't fit in the space we needed to replace the lid with something else to keep it under 24" we kept the toilet because one that short is hard to find and had another lid made to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Rosebud

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic parts. Top tank came damaged. They sent a replacement that had more defects and chips in it than original. The flush mechanism is all thin plastic and came broken twice. Gave up on this company.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: It was a good price for a single peice low back toilet
customer_reviews.text: It was the best price for a single peice low back toilet
customer_reviews.author: Don Keiser

customer_reviews.title: Product damaged- easy to get refunded
customer_reviews.text: To quick to judge. They resolved my issue fairly quickly. Impressed
customer_reviews.author: Family Guy

customer_reviews.title: How can this be solve?
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I like the toilet, but the "round flush push botton broke after a few days of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you winterize your house
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother if you winterize your house. We put this in our cottage and it broke the first winter. I have winterized thousands of toilets and never had one break. This somehow had water in the base of the toilet, like down where the bolts hold it to the floor. The tank and bowl were winterized with anti-freeze, but the bottom of the toilet blew out. I don't know if it was a design flaw, or a manufacturing flaw, or just a poor design. I can't imagine why you would want water in the base of the toilet. Don't buy if you plan to winterize your house.
customer_reviews.author: myhres

customer_reviews.title: A nice product with siphonic flush
customer_reviews.text: Replaceing a toilet can be a DIY project, the flush of this toilet is doing a good job, and the installation is not any harder but it is one-piece with a weight of 84 pounds. It is modern and good looking. The seat comes down smoothly and quietly, the seat may wriggle some if you test it with your hand, once I sit on it; it is steady. My issue is the rusty flange once the old toilet is taken out, I used the Danco Hydroseat flange repair kit to fix it, and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Ebayer

customer_reviews.title: Very very cheap and poorly designed SEAT.
customer_reviews.text: The seat on the toilet is of extremely low quality compared to the rest of the unit. Due to this I am skeptical of the internal plastic pieces of being similar junk plastic. You can visibly tell that the seat is the type you can get on ebay for about 15dollars. It moves even when tightened to the max. Very bad design and quality. For the price the the piece you touch sit on the most is just crap. Factor in about $40 dollars for your own seat in addition to the price of the toilet. Overall I'd skip this one if I had to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C.Wizzy

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but works like a bottom of the line toilet.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this toilet from the Home Depot website last year. We had it installed last November. It gave us problems after a couple months of installing and now we have to replace it less than one year after installation. The toilet seat also didn't fit right. That part looked and felt extremely cheap. The toilet looks nice overall, but it is the most disappointing working toilet we have ever owned. The Part where you flush on top also feels flimsy and cheap. Can't believe what they are charging for this. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J Davern

product_meta.title: Swiss Madison Well Made Forever SM-1T803 Chateau One Piece Toilet, Glossy White
product_meta.description: Color:Glossy WhiteThe Chateau one-piece toilet is a beautiful combination of traditional and modern design, creating a magnificent contemporary style. It compliments all bathroom suites and decor. The strong dual flush function is very dependable offering a never-failing performance.
feature_bullets: Dual flush with high-performance gravity 0.8 / 1.28 gallon per flush (gpf).
Soft closing seat, closes slowly and quietly. Quick Release for easy cleaning.
Environment Friendly WaterSense toilets, meet strict EPA flushing guidelines.
Elongated bowl offers added room and comfort.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars45 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
